entry.title: New release for Reactive Resume: v4.1.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(template): double issuer name in chikorita certificates by @abizek in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1937
  • New Translations from Crowdin by @github-actions in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1928
  • Fix(actions): skip sync crowdin action on forks by @abizek in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1939
  • New Translations from Crowdin by @github-actions in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1941
  • fix(client): fix Type Error in Picture Configuration Options by @DemaPy in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1909
  • fix(client): Fix issue with unhandled errors during resume import by @HUAHUAI23 in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1929
  • fixes #1900 - bug inputting openai api key throws weird error by @AmruthPillai in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1943

New Contributors

  • @DemaPy made their first contribution in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1909
  • @HUAHUAI23 made their first contribution in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1929

Full Changelog: https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/compare/v4.1.6...v4.1.7

entry.title: New release for Reactive Resume: v4.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(templates): added url support for custom fields by @StijnGroenen in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1999
  • set endOfLine to auto to support the codebase also on windows machines by @rinczefi-user in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/2030
  • Adding Ollama Support by @bocklucas in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/2073

New Contributors

  • @StijnGroenen made their first contribution in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/1999
  • @rinczefi-user made their first contribution in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/2030
  • @bocklucas made their first contribution in https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/pull/2073

Full Changelog: https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/compare/v4.1.7...v4.3.0

entry.title: New release for Reactive Resume: v4.3.1
entry.content:
New Features

  • Added support for Ollama integration alongside OpenAI.
  • Enhanced accessibility with visually hidden descriptions.

Improvements

  • Refined form validation for language and skill levels.
  • Updated context menus to dropdown menus for better user interaction.
  • Improved synchronization between editor content and form states.
  • Enhanced user guidance with additional information in custom sections.
  • Updated placeholder text in profile sections to reflect a shift in focus from LinkedIn to GitHub.

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed icon and placeholder text inconsistencies in profile sections.
  • Enhanced error logging and debugging capabilities.

Chores

  • Updated package version.
  • Added new accessibility dependency.
  • Stricter console logging rules for TypeScript files.
  • Streamlined CI workflow for linting, testing, and building.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/compare/v4.3.0...v4.3.1

entry.title: New release for Reactive Resume: v4.3.2
entry.content:
Improvements

  • Use the Simple Icons Font, instead of Simple Icons CDN
  • Auto-deploy the latest image of the service when publishing a new image on DockerHub

Fixes

  • Issue with LinkedIn logo not appearing on resumes, resolves https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/issues/2126
  • Updated crowd-sourced translations to latest version

Full Changelog: https://github.com/AmruthPillai/Reactive-Resume/compare/v4.3.1...v4.3.2
